title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.259 - Unrestricted funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.259 - Unrestricted funds

State Regulations

Funds which bear no external restrictions as to use or
purpose, i.e., funds which can be used for any legitimate purpose designated by
the governing board as distinguished from funds restricted externally for
specific operating purposes, for plant replacement and expansion, and for
endowment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.259

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
